name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Fukkatsu no Beldia
name_original: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Fukkatsu no Beldia
description: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Fukkatsu no Beldia, literally translated as "Give Blessings to This Wonderful World! The Resurrection of Beldia", is an original PC game which was included as a bonus item in the special edition of the first Blu-ray volume of Konosuba 2. The game follows Kazuma Satou who fights his way through various locations for saving Aqua, Megumin and Darkness who were kidnapped and controlled by Beldia. The player is presented with a series of action-platforming stages similar to Megaman and Castlevania where player must avoid obstacles and destroy enemies to reach the end of the stage. Kazuma's main weapon is dashing, sword attack and magic shoot that he uses to attack foes from a distance. When a certain level is reached, the character levels up and gain new skills. Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Fukkatsu no Beldia was released on March 24, 2017.
